Package ui.controller

Class GlobalController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.controller.GlobalController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SignOutEventListener
    public class GlobalController
extends java.lang.Object
implements SignOutEventListener
    The `GlobalController` class manages global events in the application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GlobalController​(SignOutEventBroadcaster signOutEventBroadcaster)
      Constructs a GlobalController with the specified SignOutEventBroadcaster.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addAuthController​(AuthenticateController authController)
      Adds an AuthenticateController to the GlobalController.
      void addDockedViewPage​(DockedViewPage dockedViewPage)
      Adds a DockedViewPage to the GlobalController.
      void addMenuInventoryAppController​(MenuInventoryAppController menuInventoryAppController)
      Adds a MenuInventoryAppController to the GlobalController.
      GlobalSharedState getSharedState()
      Returns the shared state of the GlobalController.
      void onSignOutEvent()
      Handles the sign-out event by invoking the onSignOutEvent method on the dockedViewPage, menuInventoryAppController, and authController.
